1: Shout out praises to the LORD, all the earth!
2: Worship the LORD with joy! Enter his presence with joyful singing!
3: Acknowledge that the LORD is God! He made us and we belong to him; we are his people, the sheep of his pasture.
4: Enter his gates with thanksgiving, and his courts with praise! Give him thanks! Praise his name!
5: For the LORD is good. His loyal love endures, and he is faithful through all generations.
